column1: What a creative way to celebrate #SmallBusinessSaturday! Socially distant outdoor pop-up shops are open on the WB square for the next 2 weeks. A great partnership between @Downtown_WB and Greater Wyoming Valley Chamber in support of our local businesses. https://t.co/xo28M9h9Pe

Happy #Thanksgiving from Team Cartwright! Our success in this campaign was because of our strong network of grassroots support and it enables us to continue working to Move #NEPA Forward -- that's what we're grateful for this year. Be safe and healthy everyone. https://t.co/aM2O3pIEqV

Today we pay tribute to those who fought to defend the United States along with all the rights and freedoms Americans enjoy. For your service and your sacrifice we thank you. #VeteransDay https://t.co/3W5XPxXhuq

A record number of people made their voices heard in this election. They chose a vision for our nation rooted in working with & for every American. With @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris in the White House we can begin on the path to binding our nation's wounds & move America forward!
I'd like to say a few words about our election victory in #PA08 today. Tune in on Facebook at 6:00 p.m. ET. https://t.co/KYQ39lfnsX

I am grateful for the many supporters and voters who powered this campaign and I look forward to continue serving Northeastern Pennsylvanians. Let's get to work and Move #NEPA Forward. https://t.co/aviBYIYkaa

There has been historic participation in this election in NEPA. We ran a campaign we can all be proud of and I'm confident that we will come out on top as the count goes on. Let's remain patient & allow the process to continue as officials work to provide decisive results ASAP.
If you’re in line before 8pm you still have the right to vote. Stay in line and cast your vote. If you need any assistance call 1-833-PA-VOTES. https://t.co/eP3YHfbji6
2 hours to go. Cast your ballot. https://t.co/wGJPRRb2IQ #ElectionDay

There's so much at stake this Election-- affordable health care good-paying jobs recovering from #COVID19. Americans across the country are counting on YOU to vote. Drop off your ballot at your County Election office or go to the polls before 8p.m. https://t.co/wGJPRQTrRi https://t.co/bLc2s6CIyJ
Final #ElectionDay stops in Pike & Wayne counties. Thank you to all the volunteers who are making sure people get out to vote today. https://t.co/vxdPftXn8R

Just stopped by Tobyhanna in Monroe Co and voters are fired up to cast their ballot! Thankful for all the supporters who have come out today and supported me and Democrats up and down the ballot. Let's keep the momentum going! #Election2020 https://t.co/YRZr6wG3jH

Back home in Moosic and I am happy to see long lines of folks participating in our democracy. Poll workers are ready to welcome you in and help you cast your ballot. Remember if you have any issues or questions call the voter assistance hotline: 1-833-PA-VOTES. #Election2020 https://t.co/DQ7Ung04ot

My family and I are excited to be out on the trail today visiting voters across the district! I am thrilled to see record turnout and grateful for all the poll workers and volunteers who are making #Election2020 happen! https://t.co/SgvNUJuHHs
If you have any issues at your voting location call the voter assistance hotline at 1-833-PA-VOTES. #Election2020 https://t.co/ynYNu74CDQ

Today's the day folks. Polls just opened across the Commonwealth and if you haven't cast your vote you have until 8p.m.! Find your polling location at https://t.co/nQ6eQS3dZh. #Election2020 https://t.co/yyCRPCsC7x

Glad to welcome our next Vice President @KamalaHarris to Luzerne alongside our labor community. Thanks to the many volunteers who joined us and canvassed across the county to #GOTV. Let's finish strong everyone! #PA08 #VoteBlue https://t.co/4gFwbybwnw

I'm counting on you to help your neighbors and family vote! Will you reach out to 3️⃣ voters today and make sure they return their mail-in ballot ASAP or are ready to go to the polls tomorrow? Send them over to https://t.co/nQ6eQS3dZh to make a plan. #VoteBlue #PA08 https://t.co/T6Y1MDDXSN

Polls open in less than 24 hours. Do you know when and where you're voting? We are counting on your vote to move #NEPA and America forward. Make your #ElectionDay plan at https://t.co/wGJPRQTrRi. https://t.co/Zee0QXKmB0

Thanks to all who joined us for our #NEPA Votes Blue #GOTV event. We are so close to the finish line and need to leave it all on the field. I hope you will join us and make calls to voters in these final two days. #PA08 https://t.co/EGYK6cNHXs https://t.co/8JRLWRLQap

We need every voter across #NEPA ready to cast their ballot. If you are voting from home drop your ballot off as soon as possible & if you're voting on #ElectionDay be sure you know where to go. The future of our economy depends on it. Find out more: https://t.co/wGJPRQTrRi https://t.co/lBmLjPW2OG

📣 Hey everybody-- important message here for our #TeamCartwright supporters. I hope you will join us tomorrow for a special #GOTV rally with Dem leaders and make calls to voters to make sure they're ready to vote on #ElectionDay. Register here: https://t.co/VnPj4EDnUJ https://t.co/aSWyRwYIfX

Thanks to everyone in Wilkes-Barre working to #GOTV today! Less than 72 HOURS before Election Day. Did you already submit your ballot or you do have a plan to get to your polling place on 11/3? Did you remind three friends to vote? #VoteBlue #PA08 https://t.co/Pyic3kQGfO
Thank you Allison! I am fired up for #GOTV weekend and thankful to you and your daughter for supporting Joe and me. https://t.co/Ekxwl3z6uw

3 Days left and we all know there's a lot on the line. Find your polling place and make sure you're ready to #VoteBlue to protect seniors' hard-earned benefits.  https://t.co/zg82Q72M7g https://t.co/xNSBW9kLmb

Folks we’ve got a busy weekend ahead of us mobilizing #NEPA to #GOTV. I hope you will join us for a volunteer shift and help us do everything we can to have record turnout.  Sign up here:  https://t.co/EGYK6cNHXs

Hey folks-- let's make a plan vote on #ElectionDay:   1⃣ Do you know where your polling location is and how you are getting there? 2⃣ Do you know what time you will vote?  3⃣ Do you know what you need to bring?   Find out more at https://t.co/wGJPRQTrRi https://t.co/7FKps78rxB
This Sunday at 2:30pm join me @BobCasey @PAForJBS and State Rep. Kosierowski for a #GOTV rally to mobilize voters! Can we count on you to be there? Register in advance here: https://t.co/VnPj4EDnUJ

We are 5⃣ days away from #ElectionDay & I urge you to return your mail-in ballot ASAP at your County Board of Elections Office or an official dropbox. We need to get our economy back on track & make medicines in America again & it starts with your vote. https://t.co/owKLu47Mvo https://t.co/pdnPRxifOK

I am grateful for @SSWorks' endorsement. Social Security and Medicare were created as a promise to every American that they would have a secure retirement and access to affordable health care after a lifetime of hard work. I will always uphold that promise. https://t.co/O4QfGR7PRF

I've listened to the epidemiologists & we can manage this virus. Our students are counting on their leaders to keep them safe in this pandemic and we do so with a national plan-- one that includes resources for masks PPE & sanitation tools for schools. https://t.co/BqAi6tYAMN

Hey everyone-- folks are returning ballots early in record numbers this year. Have you? Follow these steps and make a plan to return your ballot as soon as possible. #ReadytoVote #Election2020 https://t.co/2Pbitpf75Z
NEPA is fired up for @JoeBiden! And we've got Democrats running all the way down the ballot who are ready to help him beat this virus and #BuildBackBetter. https://t.co/jhV9fUpUf7

In #NEPA we know who built the middle class: it was organized labor! I'm proud to stand with the brothers and sisters in labor. Together we're fighting for an economy that puts workers first especially those on the front lines in this pandemic. https://t.co/KmEJuRpFjb

Our educators & families are doing everything they can to keep their communities safe while continuing our children's education. We need comprehensive #COVID19 relief to equip them with the PPE & technology needed to teach and learn amid the pandemic.  https://t.co/2ZukI9xE4l

Folks-- if you're voting from home return your ballot as soon as possible. Our health care our economy and our nation's recovery are on the line. Get your ballot in today and track it here: https://t.co/0oLn1ad35D   https://t.co/lYarHR1Mbp

Volunteers in Pike County are working hard to keep #NEPA Blue! Whether you’re fighting for progress on health care our pandemic response better jobs or something else let’s give it everything we’ve got in these last 12 days. #VoteBlue #PA08 https://t.co/v7hT27GjkQ
12 Days 3 ways Vote today. #Election2020 https://t.co/5S3U0ZJm9y

Democrats & Republicans are making progress in COVID relief talks but Mitch McConnell is ruling out any bipartisan deal. Americans know we need another major bill to control the spread of the virus and keep our economy afloat. We have to get this done. https://t.co/hh0OquZ4wB

Hey everyone--@BarackObama is coming to PA today and has an important message for Pennsylvanian voters:  1) Make a plan  2) Vote as soon as possible  3) If you're voting from home return your ballot ASAP and remember– no naked ballots  #ReadytoVote #Election2020 https://t.co/m2rJK0bLsc

I'm so proud to have the support of Carpenters Local 445 and I'm grateful for the work you're doing to get the word out about our campaign. In Congress I'll keep working to invest in our infrastructure so we can create jobs and revitalize our economy! https://t.co/k66QpmL9DD

Thanks for your support @Bob_Casey! This is a great walkthrough for people in #NEPA who are planning to #VoteBlue from home. With two weeks until #ElectionDay it's critical that you make a plan to cast your ballot. Find answers to your questions at https://t.co/eonRywUfgU https://t.co/vCs3fRMovd

After a lifetime of hard work retirees deserve their earned benefits & access to affordable health care https://t.co/pR7rblJW0U

ICYMI: At last night's debate I hope I showed voters the work I've done to invest in #NEPA. I look forward to moving us forward on a strong response to #COVID19 re-building an economy that works for everyone and strengthening our earned benefits and health care. #PA8Debate https://t.co/qHR5emSEhn

1 Weekend. 50+ Volunteers. 20306 Calls Made to Voters.   I am so proud of this campaign and grateful for the incredible work our volunteers do to get #NEPA #ReadytoVote Join us next weekend and help us get out the vote. https://t.co/sqjJIAM3dS #ForNEPA https://t.co/4fPooPxEri
